books.description: Using combat and training experiences, former Navy SEALs explain some opposing forces in leading others. 10 hours, 34 minutes unabridged. Read by the authors.
books.title: THE DICHOTOMY OF LEADERSHIP

books.author: Sally Field
books.description: A memoir by the two-time Academy Award and three-time Emmy Award winner. 10 hours, 41 minutes unabridged. Read by the author.
books.title: IN PIECES

books.author: Yuval Noah Harari
books.description: How Homo sapiens became Earth’s dominant species. 15 hours, 17 minutes unabridged. Read by Derek Perkins.
books.title: SAPIENS

books.author: Jocko Willink and Leif Babin
books.contributor: by Jocko Willink and Leif Babin
books.description: Applying the principles of Navy SEALs leadership training to any organization. 8 hours, 15 minutes unabridged. Read by the authors.
books.title: EXTREME OWNERSHIP

books.author: Trevor Noah
books.description: A memoir about growing up in South Africa by the host of “The Daily Show." 8 hours, 50 minutes unabridged. Read by the author.
books.title: BORN A CRIME

books.author: Charles Duhigg
books.description: An examination of the science behind habits. 10 hours, 57 minutes unabridged. Read by Mike Chamberlain.
books.title: THE POWER OF HABIT

books.author: Niall Kishtainy
books.description: An overview of the theories and major events of economics. 9 hours, 52 minutes unabridged. Read by Steven Crossley.
books.title: A LITTLE HISTORY OF ECONOMICS

books.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson
books.description: A straightforward, easy-to-understand introduction to the universe. 3 hours, 41 minutes unabridged. Read by the author.
books.title: ASTROPHYSICS FOR PEOPLE IN A HURRY

books.author: Angela Duckworth
books.description: A psychologist argues that passion and perseverance are the keys to success. 9 hours, 22 minutes unabridged. Read by the author.
books.title: GRIT

books.author: Greg Lukianoff and Jonathan Haidt
books.contributor: by Greg Lukianoff and Jonathan Haidt
books.description: An investigation of cultural trends that the authors argue are failing the next generation. 10 hours, 6 minutes. Read by Jonathan Haidt.
books.title: THE CODDLING OF THE AMERICAN MIND

books.author: John Carreyrou
books.description: The rise and fall of Theranos, the biotech startup that failed to deliver on its promise to make blood testing more efficient. 11 hours, 36 minutes unabridged. Read by Will Damron.
books.title: BAD BLOOD

books.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson and Avis Lang
books.contributor: by Neil deGrasse Tyson and Avis Lang
books.description: Observations of the two-way relationship between science and military power. 18 hours, 38 minutes unabridged. Read by Courtney B. Vance and Neil deGrasse Tyson.
books.title: ACCESSORY TO WAR
